description:
Soldier Talk Lite is an app that translates whatever text you enter into the Royal Air Force 1943 - 1956 phonetic alphabet. Throughout history, the phonetic alphabets have changed and with Soldier Talk Lite you can go back in time. 

Once your text is translated, you have the options to share the results via email or put your translated text into your Facebook status for your friends to see.

We believe that Soldier Talk Lite is not only for former and current military personnel, we believe that there are several other uses for Soldier Talk Lite. You can use Soldier Talk Lite to send a coded message via email or if you have a difficult name to spell or pronounce, you can use Soldier Talk Lite to help others spell your name correctly for once. Example: Lite is Love, Item, Tare, Easy in the Royal Air Force 1943 - 1956 phonetic alphabet. We are sure there are several other uses for Soldier Talk Lite. 

Here are a list of the features available in the full version of the app, Soldier Talk *NOW 50% OFF*;

1. Access to more phonetic alphabets : 
- ICAO Alphabet (NATO) 
- Royal Navy 1914 - 1918 
- Signalese 1914 - 1918 
- Royal Air Force 1924 - 1942 
- Royal Air Force 1943 - 1956 
- United States 1941 - 1956 
- Morse Code. 

2. The ability to share results via Text Message 

3. Unlimited Free Updates and New Features for Life 

Please send us an email & let us know how you use Soldier Talk Lite.
